snippet.title: Absolute Drift: Zen Edition Announcement Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Are you ready to begin your journey to become a drifting master? Explore a gorgeous minimalistic landscape while learning the art of sliding sideways. Absolute Drift: Zen edition is packed full of 30+ challenging tracks, 6 customizable cars, and a gorgeous open world. An indie collaboration between Flippfly and Funselektor Labs.
Song: Cardamom Mountains by C41

http://flippfly.com/absolutedrift
